```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "What.types.of.treatments.are.you.currently.receiving.for.your.OUD."
t <- "What types of treatments are you currently receiving for your OUD?"
q_data <- get_single_selection(data = raw_data, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
q_plot<- clean_single_select(q_data)
r <- plot_single_select(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'output/q24_oud_treatment.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'output/q24_oud_treatment_5.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
